entry.title: version.relay behavior change
entry.summary: The author of this message, e, is seeking an explanation for changes in the behavior of nodes running /Satoshi:0.15.0/ and later. Specifically, these nodes no longer appear to be following the version.relay=false flag as outlined in BIP37. The author requests that someone familiar with the changes provide a rationale for this alteration. No further information is provided in this brief message.
